'''Debac''' was a scrupulous [[Netherese]] [[priest]] who guarded the [[Netheril Mint]] in [[Eileanar]] until its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Debac was responsible for guarding the front doors of the Mint. She used [[divination]] magic to supplement the regular security and ensure that no coins were stolen and smuggled out.
